content: row in stockinette stitch while keeping the 7 edge stitches on each side in k1 p1 rib ending with a purl row dividing for sleeves p1 k1 3 times p1 sm k till 1 stitch before next marker k1tbl remove marker sleep sleeve stitches onto holder cast on 2 stitches using the loop cast on remove next marker k1tbl k till one stitch before next marker k1tbl remove marker place sleeve stitches on a holder cast on 2 stitches using the loop cast on remove marker knit till last marker sm p1 k1 3 times p1 knitting the body you will be alternating 2 row with cestari with c1 and 2 row of cestari with c2 for the first 10 row of the body and will knit the rest of the body with cestari and c2 all body row will be knit as follows row 1 k1 p1 3 times k1 sm p till marker sm k1 p1 3 times k1 row 2 p1 k1 3 times p1 sm k till next marker sm p1 k1 3 times p1 repeat row 1 and 2 until piece measures 8 5 9 9 5 10 10 5 from underarm ending with row 2 finish the body of the sweater by knitting in k1 p1 rib for 3 5 as follows for personal use only asheville row 1 k1 p1 for the entire row ending k1 row 2 p1 k1 for the entire row ending p1 bind off loosely in pattern for personal use only asheville knitting the sleeves transfer the right sleeve stitches back on your needle the sleeve will be knitted using the magic loop method with cestari and c1 held together pick up and knit one stitch at the underarm k till the end pick up and knit one stitch at the underarm the beginning of you round will be between the 2 underarm stitches k 6 rounds in stockinette stitch decrease round k1 k2tog knit till the last 3 stitches ssk k1 k 7 rounds in stockinette stitch without decreasing these 8 rounds form your decrease pattern repeat the last 8 rounds decrease round and even round 2 more times alternate 2 row of cestari with c1 and 2 row of cestari with c2 for 8 row decreasing as above on the 8 th round then continue with cestari and c2 only decreasing as previously established in the decrease pattern repeating the decrease pattern 2 more times you will have 6 sets of decreases along your sleeve continue knitting the sleeve without decreasing until you are 1 away from where your hand meets your wrist knit in k1 p1 rib for 3 5 bind off loosely repeat for the other sleeve finishing weave in all ends steam the sweater gently enjoy for personal use only
